revised_title: Kenneth Lyon Blaxter: A Pioneering Figure in Animal Nutrition and Agriculture
tldr: The biography of Kenneth Lyon Blaxter, a leading authority on the nutrition and food requirements of farm animals. Born and raised in Norwich, Blaxter's fascination with life on earth led him to pursue a career in agriculture and veterinary science. He made significant contributions to the field, influencing national policies and advancing our understanding of animal nutrition.
